product_name: SmartWool Socks Sampler Set - Toddlers' - 2 Pairs
long_description: With a soft merino wool blend, the SmartWool socks sampler set offers 2 pair of warm and cozy havens for infants' tootsies. Made from soft merino wool blended with nylon and a touch of spandex, these socks wick moisture away from feet, keeping them dry and cool in summer and warm in winter. Soft roll-down cuffs are comfortable against tender skin. Set includes 2 pairs of socks. *Discount will be applied when you check out. Offer not valid for sale-price items ending in $._3 or $._9. Please note: a package of 2 pairs counts as 1 pair of socks for the 10% volume discount.
short_description: With a soft merino wool blend, the SmartWool socks sampler set offers 2 pair of warm and cozy havens for infants' tootsies.
